Class ib_FilterMotionBlur

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class ib_FilterMotionBlur
extends ib_a_Ops
    A filter which produces motion blur the slow, but higher-quality way.
